content: The history of the relationship between the Catholic Church and the Jews was not always a happy or an easy one. Too often it was written in tears.
translations: ita:Il rapporto tra la Chiesa cattolica e gli ebrei non è sempre stato, nella storia, felice o facile. Troppo spesso è stato
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by al_ex_an_der (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
